title: Regarding VS Tokens
body: I'm not sure if anyone has asked this, but I was wondering if we'll continue to be able to earn VS tokens until July 24, 2017? It specifies in the client that they will expire on July 24, 2017 but will we continue to be able to earn them until that day?

replies.body: You won't be able to acquire tokens after the event ends on 6/29/17. Leftover tokens will stay in your loot until July 24 where you will be able to trade 10 tokens for 10 blue essence.

> You won't be able to acquire tokens after the event ends on 6/29/17. Leftover tokens will stay in your loot until July 24 where you will be able to trade 10 tokens for 10 blue essence.

Thank you for the clarification, sir. Also, if a player were to open an Orb of Order/Chaos and receive a random number of tokens along with the guaranteed legacy skin shard, is there a minimum and maximum amount of random tokens that can be acquired?

Ooooo that's a good question! A number of tokens you get from orbs is random, and I'm actually not even sure what the maximum possible drop is. I can say I've personally seen 20 drop each time, although I've only opened 2 so far xD!
